Response.Say: Thanks for calling the CSS Dev Conf Text Voting Line. You look great. Please text your vote at the number you just dialed, (504) 299-6828, using your favorite mobile device. When casting your vote, include at least two pieces of information: The first bit of information in your text should be the hashtag of the session. After the hashtag, add a space. Then the next piece of information is the rating of the session that is from 1 to 5 (5 being the best). After the number rating, add another space and write a comments along with your vote. Your comments help in case there is a tie. Thanks again for calling. Have you lost weight? Enjoy the rest of CSS Dev Conf The Alamo!
